about.title: About
about.content:
After a route in building and energy engineering, I chose to learn computer programming, and I started a course at school 42.
I specialized in web and application development, using technologies such as Flutter / Dart, Vue.js.

download.question: Would you like to download this magnificient CV ?

neocity.content:
Realization of cross-platform applications for city dwellers, via Cordova / Ionic.
Use of Angular for the applications and Node.js for the API.

iota.content: Realization of a PoC on a smart grid (JS/nodeJs) after the IOTA Hackathon at 42. Use of the IOTA network to perform micro-transactions (data and monetary) between the different actors (IoT). Presentation of PoC with IOTA in Amsterdam at the Blockchain Expo Europe 2018

42.content: Followed the curriculum of 42, training in programming. Several projects in C of type recoding ls / printf, recreate a command interpreter. And initiation to web PHP / HTML / CSS (2 weeks of training)

whv.content: Language studies in Australia: discovery of the country and various professional experiences

cepi.content:
Thermal study project manager (RT 2012)
Design and dimensioning of heating, ventilation, air-conditioning and insulation of buildings

cdb.content: Carrying out an energy audit of the industrial process

42sh.title: 42SH
42sh.content: Development of a UNIX shell, such as BASH / ZSH

iota.title: SMART GRID / IOTA
iota.content: PoC of a smart grid using the IOTA tangle and performing micro-transactions between different actors.

gameJam.title: GAME JAM
gameJam.content:
Making a game at the Global Game Jam, with:
Francçois Corbel (Dev / Game Designer), Lucien Coycault (Graphic Designer), Jeff Guerin (Sound Designer)

flutterApp.title: FLUTTER APP
flutterApp.content: Developed an application that can record and play sounds (Flutter / Dart)
